frame.txt: 惊艳的特技飞行！一次勇敢而成功的尝试！
frame.txt_en: Amazing aerobatics! A brave and successful attempt!

frame.txt: Keel Mini 四旋翼无人机具备极高的机动性和稳定性，可在高速飞行时完成复杂的翻滚动作。其过载控制表现同样出色，达到行业先进水平，为飞手提供稳定舒适的飞行体验。根据最新测试，KEEL Mini 的最高飞行速度可达 40m/s，适用于高速飞行和远程飞行。此外，它还能执行对机动性和精准操控要求极高的任务，如空中巡查、搜救任务或编队飞行等。 视频：KEEL MINI高速特技飞行演示
frame.txt_en: Keel Mini quadcopter has very high maneuverability and stability, and can perform complex roll movements while flying at high speeds. The overload control also performs very well, reaching the industry’s advanced level, providing pilots with a stable and comfortable flight experience. According to the latest test, the maximum flight speed of KEEL Mini can reach 40m/s. It is suitable for high-speed flight and long-distance flight. It can also perform tasks that require high maneuverability and precise control, such as air patrol, search and rescue, or formation tasks.

frame.src: company_news/KEEL MINI高速特技飞行演示.mp4
